CustomField.description: Service = work type used to define the skills needed to perform the service. Also, if a Service Territory offers this service then it will be related to this record. Scheduling = work type used to define the duration of the total services selected, rounded up. For example Oil Change + Battery combined would take 90 minutes. This work type will be selected behind the scenes and used to for scheduling purposes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Service = work type used to define the skills needed to perform the service. Also, if a Service Territory offers this service then it will be related to this record. Scheduling = work type used to define the duration of the total services selected, rounded up. For example Oil Change + Battery combined would take 90 minutes. This work type will be selected behind the scenes and used to for scheduling purposes.
CustomField.label: Type
